author: passthenachos
title: Charity Funding SPO
description: Underprivileged children lack access to financial education programs. Giving funds to children must have a parents approval and management
solution: SPO for direct funding of children through financial education lessons and donations. Create a way to fund child account linked to education
experience: The founding team holds over 20 US patents, 2 Technical Emmys, 1 Oscar, Multiple exits, existing web 2.0 Series B funded with A list clients
